verses.plain: Make a joyful noise unto God, all ye lands:

tokens.t: Make a joyful noise unto God, all ye lands:

verses.plain: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.

tokens.t: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.

verses.plain: Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.

tokens.t: Say unto God, How terrible
thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.

verses.plain: All the earth shall worship thee, and shall sing unto thee; they shall sing to thy name. Selah.

tokens.t: All the earth shall worship thee, and shall sing unto thee; they shall sing
thy name. Selah.

verses.plain: Come and see the works of God: he is terrible in his doing toward the children of men.

tokens.t: Come and see the works of God:
terrible
doing toward the children of men.

verses.plain: He turned the sea into dry land: they went through the flood on foot: there did we rejoice in him.

tokens.t: He turned the sea into dry
they went through the flood on foot: there did we rejoice in him.

verses.plain: He ruleth by his power for ever; his eyes behold the nations: let not the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah.

tokens.t: He ruleth by his power for ever; his eyes behold the nations: let not the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah.

verses.plain: O bless our God, ye people, and make the voice of his praise to be heard:

tokens.t: O bless our God, ye people, and make the voice of his praise to be heard:

verses.plain: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.

tokens.t: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.

verses.plain: For thou, O God, hast proved us: thou hast tried us, as silver is tried.

tokens.t: For thou, O God, hast proved us: thou hast tried us, as silver is tried.

verses.plain: Thou broughtest us into the net; thou laidst affliction upon our loins.

tokens.t: Thou broughtest us into the net; thou laidst affliction upon our loins.

verses.plain: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.

tokens.t: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy

verses.plain: I will go into thy house with burnt offerings: I will pay thee my vows,

tokens.t: I will go into thy house with burnt offerings: I will pay thee my vows,

verses.plain: Which my lips have uttered, and my mouth hath spoken, when I was in trouble.

tokens.t: Which my lips have uttered, and my mouth hath spoken, when I was in trouble.

verses.plain: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. Selah.

tokens.t: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. Selah.

verses.plain: Come and hear, all ye that fear God, and I will declare what he hath done for my soul.

tokens.t: Come
hear, all ye that fear God, and I will declare what he hath done for my soul.

verses.plain: I cried unto him with my mouth, and he was extolled with my tongue.

tokens.t: I cried unto him with my mouth, and he was extolled with my tongue.

verses.plain: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:

tokens.t: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear

verses.plain: But verily God hath heard me; he hath attended to the voice of my prayer.

tokens.t: verily God hath heard
he hath attended to the voice of my prayer.

verses.plain: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.

tokens.t: Blessed
God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.

footnotes.text: submit…: or, yield feigned obedience: Heb. lie
